text:
Many more people are now being offered their Covid-19 vaccine, including the over 70's. It is free-of-charge for everyone on the NHS, you will not be charged for it. Don't fall victim to fraud.

#Covid19 #vaccine #StayAtHome #ProtectTheNHS #SaveLives #EEMS #eventmedical https://t.co/DWerP6d0gO
